Judul: THE DESIGN OF BUSINESS PROCESS BASED ON SOX SECTION 404
Abstrak: The results of this report containing results from a comparison of business processes that have been made by PT. X with SOX regulations and also solutions to every problem that occurs from the process of business processes mapping that will be very useful for PT. X in their readiness in implementing the company's SOX regulatory compliance phase starting from business processes.
Kata Kunci: business process, regulation of SOX, risk and control
